name: Endless Wonder VR
description:
Endless Wonder VR is a colorful VR platformer in which you will need to use the capabilities of VR to complete a campaign consisting of various levels. You must avoid enemies and their attacks. They will try to send you back to the last save zone, so you must be dexterous enough, to avoid all their attacks.


The whole game is based on the unique sticks mechanics. You should try to unlock them all and use their abilities to finish all levels. Each level provides a unique stylized environment and a set of obstacles and enemies. Discover all the secrets of the world of Endless Wonder and get a lot of positive emotions.


Our game will provide you with a unique experience that you have never encountered anywhere before, because we implemented unique game mechanics which you can combine in any way which you want. Endless Wonder requires a fast reaction in some situations, so you should always be on the alert.
